entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
